title: Angled Phone Stand
summary: Compact stand with tilted back plate, lip, and rear support brace for smartphones.

parameters.base_width: Width of the base platform; determines device width accommodation.
parameters.base_depth: Depth of the base platform along the viewing axis.
parameters.back_height: Height of the angled support panel.
parameters.tilt_angle: Back panel tilt in degrees from vertical.
parameters.lip_height: Front lip height that prevents the phone from sliding forward.

notes: Shows use of rotations and braces to form a stable support structure.
